Definition.WordDefinition: Encouraging \En*cour"a*ging\, a. Furnishing ground to hope; inspiriting; favoring. -- {En*cour"a*ging*ly}, adv. [1913 Webster]

encouraging adj 1: giving courage or confidence or hope; "encouraging advances in medical research" [ant: {discouraging}] 2: furnishing support and encouragement; "the anxious child needs supporting and accepting treatment from the teacher" [syn: {supporting}] 3: tending to favor or bring good luck; "miracles are auspicious accidents"; "encouraging omens"; "a favorable time to ask for a raise"; "lucky stars"; "a prosperous moment to make a decision" [syn: {auspicious}, {favorable}, {favourable}, {lucky}, {prosperous}]
